name: Instant Sites
description: instantsiteZ is a new generation of web
overview:
instantsiteZ is a new generation of web 2.0 site builder. We provide all-in-one solution for you to create your own website that includes CMS, templates, hosting, 24 hours support, and free upgrades. Your website will be unique and search engines optimized.

We have tons of modules for you to choose from - blogs, forums, questions and answers, guest book, and more! Setup is fast and easy. With drag and drop, point and click, you don’t have to know any technical knowledge.

There’s also no software to purchase and download.
